text: Pany Yathotou (born 18 February 1951) is a Laotian politician. She is a member of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. In 2021, she became the Vice President of Laos. She was the chairman and governor of the Bank of the Lao P.D.R. from 1988 until 1997.https://www.bol.gov.la/en/fileupload/16-01-2017_1484562094.pdf Yathotou later became a member of the National Assembly in 1998. She became the President of the National Assembly of Laos in 2010. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Laos Category:Presidents of the National Assembly (Laos)
title: Pany Yathotou
